str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A primary interjection; as a sign of the vocative case, O; as a note of exclamation, oh.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Vocative Masculine Singular
str2: Properly, to distinguish, i.e. Decide; by implication, to try, condemn, punish.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Vocative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
(including the other inflections); from toi and houtos; truly this, i.e. Of this sort (to denote character or individuality).

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To reckon, count, charge with; reason, decide, conclude; think, suppose.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To flee out, away, escape; with an acc: I escape something. From ek and pheugo; to flee out.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
